name: vimcode-config
description: LazyVim-inspired Vim configuration for VS Code with 50+ keybindings. Bring Neovim muscle memory to VS Code with full LSP, Git integration, and modern editor features.
author: wojukasz

scripts.install:vscode: code --install-extension vscodevim.vim && code --install-extension eamodio.gitlens && code --install-extension hoovercj.vscode-settings-cycler
scripts.install:cursor: cursor --install-extension vscodevim.vim && cursor --install-extension eamodio.gitlens && cursor --install-extension hoovercj.vscode-settings-cycler
